column1: Apply this rule with provided coupons only. Comma separated. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.

column1: Apply this rule with ANY specified discount rules. Create rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule

column1: Not apply this rule with provided coupons only. Comma separated. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.
